summary: This document includes payroll authorization forms and related documents for Charles Michael Berk, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), including details of his appointment, salary, and a certification of non-relationship to any current member of Congress.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents, dated between March 1978 and January 1979, pertains to the payroll and employment details of Charles Michael Berk, who worked for the U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The records include payroll authorization forms detailing his appointment as a Senior Researcher and later as a Research Attorney, his salary of $18,000.00, and a certificate attesting that he is not related to any sitting member of Congress. The documents are signed by Louis Stokes, Chairman of the HSCA, and a memorandum from G. Robert Blakey notifies relevant staff of Berk's appointment.
title: Payroll Authorization Form
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
